properties.areaDesc: Waters from Savannah GA to Altamaha Sound GA extending from 20 nm to 60 nm
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued January 2 at 3:22PM EST until January 5 at 10:00AM EST by NWS Charleston SC
properties.description:
* WHAT...West winds 25 to 35 kt with gusts up to 40 kt and seas 6
to 9 feet.

* WHERE...Savannah to Altamaha Sound from 20 to 60 NM.

* WHEN...From 7 PM Friday to 10 AM EST Sunday.

* IMPACTS...Conditions will be hazardous to small craft.
properties.instruction:
Inexperienced mariners, especially those operating smaller
vessels, should avoid navigating in hazardous conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 7 PM FRIDAY TO 10 AM EST SUNDAY
